common.confirm_reset: Do you really want to cancel the game (without scoring) and return to the selection?

history.title: Past Games
history.import_found: {count} games found. Would you like to add these to your history?
history.import_error_format: Invalid format. The file must contain an array of games.

england-high-immigration.name: High Immigration (Build)
england-high-immigration.desc: Perform the High Immigration Build action.

spirit-growth.name: Spirit Phase
spirit-growth.desc: Growth, gain energy, and play power cards.

invader-blight.name: Blighted Island
invader-blight.desc: Check Blighted Island card effect if the island is blighted.

invader-event.name: Event
invader-event.desc: Draw and resolve an Event Card (B&C / Jagged Earth).

invader-fear.name: Fear
invader-fear.desc: Flip and resolve earned Fear Cards.

invader-ravage.name: Ravage
invader-ravage.desc: Invaders deal damage to the Land and Dahan.

invader-build.name: Build
invader-build.desc: Invaders build in each land matching an Invader card in the Build space.

invader-advance.name: Invader Cards
invader-advance.desc: Advance all Invader Cards one space to the left.

invader-cascading-ravage.name: Cascading Ravage
invader-cascading-ravage.desc: Resolve additional Ravage effects if applicable.

time-passes.name: Time Passes
time-passes.desc: Heal damage, discard cards, reset elements.

spirits.heat: Rising Heat of Stone and Sand
spirits.darkness: Breath of Darkness Down Your Spine

adversary_rules.title: Adversary Rule
adversary_rules.no_rules: No specific rules for this level.
adversary_rules.fear_desc: Cards per deck level (top to bottom)
adversary_rules.deck_desc: Order of Invader cards (1=Stage I, 2=Stage II, 3=Stage III)
adversary_rules.no_setup_changes: No additional setup changes for this level.

loss_condition.name: Land Stripped Bare
loss_condition.description: At the end of the Fast Phase, the Invaders win if any land has at least 8 total Invaders/Blight (combined).

escalation.name: Mining Tunnels
escalation.description: After Advancing Invader Cards: On each board, Explore in 2 lands whose terrains don't match a Ravage or Build Card (no source required).

1.name: Avarice Rewarded / Ceaseless Mining
1.effect: Lands with 3+ Invaders are Mining lands. In Mining Lands: Build Cards cause Ravage Actions. Disease affects Ravage like Build. Blight Cascade? Upgrade 1 Invader instead.

2.name: Miners Come From Far and Wide
2.effect: Add 1 Explorer in each land with no Dahan. Add 1 Disease and 1 City in the highest-numbered land with a Town Setup symbol.
2.setup_rule: Add 1 Explorer in each land with no Dahan. Add 1 Disease and 1 City in the highest-numbered land with a Town Setup symbol.

3.name: Mining Boom (I)
3.effect: After the Build Step, on each board: Choose a land with Explorer. Upgrade 1 Explorer there.

4.name: Untapped Salt Deposits
4.effect: Setup: Remove 'Coastal Lands' Stage II card. Place 'Salt Deposits' as 2nd Stage II card. (Order: 111-2S22-33333).
4.setup_rule: Remove 'Coastal Lands'. Place 'Salt Deposits' as 2nd Stage II card.

5.name: Mining Boom (II)
5.effect: Instead of Mining Boom (I), after the Build Step, on each board: Choose a land with Explorer. Build there, then Upgrade 1 Explorer. (Build normally in a Mining land.)

6.name: The Empire Ascendant
6.effect: During Explore: On boards with 3 or fewer Blight: Add +1 Explorer in each land successfully explored. (Max. 2 lands per board per Explore Card.)

phaseHints.escalation: Escalation: Explore in 2 non-matching lands (no source).
phaseHints.land_stripped: Loss Check: 8+ Invaders/Blight in one land -> Loss.
phaseHints.ceaseless_mining: 3+ Invaders = Mining Land. Build -> Ravage. Disease works on Ravage.
phaseHints.mining_boom_2: After Build: Build then Upgrade 1 Explorer.

loss_condition.name: Trade Hub
loss_condition.description: If the number of Coastal lands with City is ever greater than (2 x # of boards), the Invaders win.

escalation.name: Ports Sprawl Outward
escalation.description: On the single board with the most Coastal Town/City, add 1 Town to the N lands with the fewest Town (N = # of players.)

1.name: Trading Port
1.effect: After Setup, in Coastal lands, Explore Cards add 1 Town instead of 1 Explorer . 'Coastal Lands' Invader cards do this for maximum 2 lands per board.

2.name: Seize Opportunity
2.effect: During Setup, add 1 City to land #2. Place 'Coastal Lands' as the 3rd Stage II card, and move the two Stage II Cards above it up by one.
2.setup_rule: Place 'Coastal Lands' as the 3rd Stage II card, and move the two Stage II Cards above it up by one. (New Deck Order: 11-22-1-C2-33333)

3.name: Chart the Coastline
3.effect: In Coastal lands, Build Cards affect lands without Invaders, so long as there is an adjacent City.

4.name: Ambition of a Minor Nation
4.effect: During Setup, replace the bottom Stage I Card with the bottom Stage III Card. (New Deck Order: 11-22-3-C2-3333))

5.name: Runoff and Bilgewater
5.effect: After a Ravage Action adds Blight to a Coastal Land, add 1 Blight to that board's Ocean (without cascading). Treat the Ocean as a Coastal Wetland for this rule and for Blight removal/movement.

6.name: Exports Fuel Inward Growth
6.effect: After the Ravage step, add 1 Town to each Inland land that matches a Ravage card and is within 1 Range of Town/City.

phaseHints.escalation: Escalation: Most Coastal Town/City? Add 1 Town to N lands with fewest Town.
phaseHints.chart_coastline: Coastal Build affects empty lands if adjacent City.
phaseHints.runoff: Ravage adds Blight to Coast? Add 1 Blight to Ocean.
phaseHints.exports: After Ravage: Add 1 Town to Inland matching land near Town/City.

loss_condition.name: Hunters Swarm the Island
loss_condition.description: Put Beasts Destroyed by Adversary rules on this panel. If there are ever more Beasts on this panel than on the island, the Invaders win.

escalation.name: Stalk the Predators
escalation.description: On each board: Add 2 Explorer (total) among lands with Beasts. If you can't, instead add 2 Explorer among lands with Beasts on a different board.

1.name: Hunters Bring Home Shell and Hide
1.effect: During Play, Explorer do +1 Damage. When Ravage adds Blight to a land (including cascades), Destroy 1 Beasts in that land.
1.setup_rule: During Setup, on each board, add 1 Beasts and 1 Explorer to the highest-numbered land without Town/City.

2.name: A Sense for Impending Disaster
2.effect: The first time each Action would Destroy Explorer: If possible, 1 of those Explorer is instead Pushed; 1 Fear when you do so.

3.name: Competition Among Hunters
3.effect: Ravage Cards also match lands with 3 or more Explorer. (If the land already matched the Ravage Card, it still Ravages just once.)

4.name: Accelerated Exploitation
4.effect: When making the Invader Deck, put 1 Stage III Card after each Stage II Card. (New Deck Order: 111-2-3-2-3-2-3-2-33)

5.name: Entrench in the Face of Fear
5.effect: When one (an unused Invader card) is revealed from under Fear Cards, immediately place it in the Build space (face-up).
5.setup_rule: Put an unused Stage II Invader Card under the top 3 Fear Cards, and an unused Stage III Card under the top 7 Fear Cards.

6.name: Pressure for Fast Profit
6.effect: After the Ravage Step of turn 2+, on each board where it added no Blight: In the land with the most Explorer (min. 1), add 1 Explorer and 1 Town.

phaseHints.escalation: Escalation: Add 2 Explorers among lands with Beasts.
phaseHints.hunters_shell: Ravage adds Blight? Destroy 1 Beasts in that land.
phaseHints.pressure_profit: After Ravage (Turn 2+): If no Blight added, add 1 Explorer + 1 Town to land with most Explorers.
phaseHints.impending_disaster: First time an Action destroys Explorers: Push 1 instead (generate 1 Fear).

loss_condition.name: Irreparable Damage
loss_condition.description: Track how many Blight come off the Blight Card during Ravages that do 8+ Damage to the land. If that number ever exceeds players, the Invaders win.

escalation.name: Seek Prime Territory
escalation.description: After the Explore Step: On each board with 4 or fewer Blight, add 1 Town to a land without Town/Blight. On each board with 2 or fewer Blight, do so again.

1.name: Migratory Herders
1.effect: After the normal Build Step: In each land matching a Build Card, Gather 1 Town from a land not matching a Build Card. (In board/land order.)

2.name: More Rural Than Urban
2.effect: During Play, when Invaders would Build 1 City in an Inland land, they instead Build 2 Town.
2.setup_rule: During Setup, on each board, add 1 Town to land #2 and 1 Town to the highest-numbered land without Setup symbols.

3.name: Fast Spread
3.effect: When making the Invader Deck, Remove 1 additional Stage I Card. (New deck order: 11-2222-33333)

4.name: Herds Thrive in Verdant Lands
4.effect: Town in lands without Blight are Durable: they have +2 Health, and 'Destroy Town' effects instead deal 2 Damage (to those Town only) per Town they could Destroy. ('Destroy all Town' works normally.)

5.name: Wave of Immigration
5.effect: When Revealed (Reminder Card), on each board, add 1 City to a Coastal land without City and 1 Town to the 3 Inland lands with the fewest Blight.
5.setup_rule: Before the initial Explore, put the Habsburg Reminder Card under the top 5 Invader Cards.

6.name: Far-Flung Herds
6.effect: Ravages do +2 Damage (total) if any adjacent lands have Town. (This does not cause lands without Invaders to Ravage.)

phaseHints.escalation: Escalation: Board <4 Blight? Add Town (no Town/Blight). <2 Blight? Do again.
phaseHints.migratory_herders: After Build: Gather 1 Town from non-matching land to matching land.
phaseHints.rural_provinces: Build Inland City -> Build 2 Towns instead.
phaseHints.irreparable_damage: Loss: Ravage 8+ Damage? Track Blight removed. > Players = Loss.
phaseHints.far_flung_herds: Ravage +2 Damage if adjacent land has Town.

loss_condition.name: Sprawling Plantations
loss_condition.description: Before Setup, return all but 7 Town per player to the box. Invaders win if you ever cannot place a Town.

escalation.name: Demand for New Cash Crops
escalation.description: After Exploring, on each board, pick a land of the shown terrain. If it has Town/City, add 1 Blight. Otherwise, add 1 Town.

1.name: Frontier Explorers
1.effect: Except during Setup: After Invaders successfully Explore into a land which had no Town/City, add 1 Explorer there.

2.name: Slave Labor
2.effect: After Invaders Build in a land with 2 Explorer or more, replace all but 1 Explorer there with an equal number of Town.
2.setup_rule: Put the 'Slave Rebellion' event under the top 3 cards of the Event Deck.

3.name: Early Plantation
3.setup_rule: On each board add 1 Town to the highest-numbered land without Town. Add 1 Town to land #1.

4.name: Triangle Trade
4.effect: Whenever Invaders Build a Coastal City, add 1 Town to the adjacent land with the fewest Town.

5.name: Slow-Healing Ecosystem
5.effect: When you remove Blight from the board, put it here instead of onto the Blight Card. As soon as you have 3 Blight per player here, move it all back to the Blight Card.

6.name: Persistent Explorers
6.effect: After resolving an Explore Card, on each board add 1 Explorer to a land without any. Fear Card effects never remove Explorer. If one would, you may instead Push that Explorer.

phaseHints.frontier_explorers: Explore in empty land (no Town/City)? Add +1 Explorer.
phaseHints.slave_labor: Build in land with 2+ Explorers? Replace all but 1 with Towns.
phaseHints.triangle_trade: Build Coastal City? Add +1 Town to adjacent land with fewest Towns.
phaseHints.persistent_explorers: After Explore Card: Add 1 Explorer to land with none. Fear effects cannot remove Explorers.
phaseHints.slow_healing: Remove Blight? Place here instead of Blight Card (max 3/player). Move back when full.
phaseHints.escalation: Escalation: Pick land. Town/City -> Blight, else -> Town.

escalation.name: Land Rush
escalation.description: On each board with Town/City, add 1 Town to a land without Town.

phaseHints.escalation: Escalation: On each board with Town/City, add 1 Town to a land without Town.

1.name: Fast Start
1.effect: During Setup, on each board add 1 Town to land #3.

2.name: Surge of Colonists
2.effect: When making the Invader Deck, put 1 of the Stage III cards between Stage I and Stage II. (New Deck Order: 111-3-2222-3333)

3.name: Efficient
3.effect: When making the Invader Deck, remove an additional Stage I card. (New Deck Order: 11-3-2222-3333)

4.name: Aggressive Timetable
4.effect: When making the Invader Deck, remove an additional Stage II card. (New Deck Order: 11-3-222-3333)

5.name: Ruthlessly Efficient
5.effect: When making the Invader Deck, remove an additional Stage I card. (New Deck Order: 1-3-222-3333)

6.name: Terrifyingly Efficient
6.effect: When making the Invader Deck, remove all Stage I cards. (New Deck Order: 3-222-3333)

escalation.name: Building Boom
escalation.description: On each board with Town/City, build in a land with the most Town/City.

loss_condition.name: Proud & Mighty Capital
loss_condition.description: If 7 or more Town/City are ever in a single land, the Invaders win.

phaseHints.indentured_servants: Indentured Servants: Invader Build Cards affect lands without Invaders if adjacent to 2+ Town/City.
phaseHints.high_immigration: High Immigration: Perform the extra Build action on the High Immigration tile.

1.name: Indentured Servants Earn Land
1.effect: Invader Build Cards affect matching lands without Invaders if they are adjacent to at least 2 Town/City.

2.name: Criminals and Malcontents
2.effect: During Setup, on each board add 1 City to land #1 and 1 Town to land #2.

3.name: High Immigration (I)
3.effect: Put the 'High Immigration' tile on the Invader board, to the left of 'Ravage'. The Invaders take this Build action each Invader phase before Ravaging. Cards slide left from Ravage to it, and from it to the discard pile. Remove the tile when a Stage II card slides onto it, putting that card in the discard.

4.name: High Immigration (full)
4.effect: The extra Build tile remains out the entire game.

6.name: Independent Resolve
6.setup_rule: Add 1 Fear per player to the Fear Pool.
6.effect: During any Invader Phase where you resolve no Fear Cards, perform the High Immigration Build twice. (Has no effect if no card is in the High Immigration slot.)

escalation.name: Swayed by the Invaders
escalation.description: After Invaders Explore into each land this Phase, if that land has at least as many Invaders as Dahan, replace 1 Dahan with 1 Town.

phaseHints.escalation: Escalation: Swayed by the Invaders: After Invaders Explore into each land this Phase, if that land has at least as many Invaders as Dahan, replace 1 Dahan with 1 Town.
phaseHints.heavy_mining: Heavy Mining: If the Invaders do at least 6 Damage to the land during Ravage, add an extra Blight. The additional Blight does not destroy Presence or cause cascades.
phaseHints.fine_steel: Fine Steel for Tools and Guns: Town deal 3 Damage. City deal 5 Damage.
phaseHints.mining_rush: Mining Rush: When Ravaging adds at least 1 Blight to a land, also add 1 Town to an adjacent land without Town/City. Cascading Blight does not cause this effect.

1.name: Heavy Mining
1.effect: If the Invaders do at least 6 Damage to the land during Ravage, add an extra Blight. The additional Blight does not destroy Presence or cause cascades.

2.name: Population Pressure at Home
2.effect: During Setup, on each board add 1 City to land #4. On boards where land #4 starts with Blight, put that Blight in land #5 instead.

3.name: Fine Steel for Tools and Guns
3.effect: Town deal 3 Damage. City deal 5 Damage.

4.name: Royal Backing
4.effect: During Setup, after adding all other Invaders, Accelerate the Invader Deck. On each board, add 1 Town to the land of that terrain with the fewest Invaders.

5.name: Mining Rush
5.effect: When Ravaging adds at least 1 Blight to a land, also add 1 Town to an adjacent land without Town/City. Cascading Blight does not cause this effect.

6.name: Prospecting Outpost
6.effect: During setup, on each board add 1 Town and 1 Blight to land #8. The Blight comes from the box, not the Blight Card.
